mapper.insert: insert into control (id, name, `system`, module_id, project_id, `by`, expression, description, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, status) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{system}, #{moduleId}, #{projectId}, #{by}, #{expression}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{status})
mapper.delete: update control set status = 'Trash' where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from control where project_id = #{projectId} and module_id = #{moduleId} and `system`=#{system} and status != 'Trash'
select con.id, con.name, con.`system`, con.module_id, con.by, con.expression, vm.name as moduleName from control con left join view_module vm on vm.id = con.module_id where con.id = #{id}
select * from control where module_id = #{moduleId} and name = #{name} and `system`=#{system} limit 1
